ch0286_40_svboy/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s learn something new—and make today
special!
ch0286_40_svboy/7101_0701_01_10: What do you think of this outfit? I love it!
ch0286_40_svboy/7101_0701_02_10:
My favorite part is the hat. It looks good on
me, don’t you think?
ch0286_40_svboy/7102_0701_01_10:
Each time Ogerpon changes her mask,
she shows a different side of herself.
ch0286_40_svboy/7102_0701_02_10:
Her true face, when she has no mask on,
is also cute.
ch0286_40_svboy/7102_0701_03_10:
She almost always wears a mask when she
battles, so maybe seeing her true face is a
privilege for her friends!
ch0286_40_svboy/7103_0701_01_10:
I’ve listened to professors on Pasio—from
many different regions—talk about Pokémon.
ch0286_40_svboy/7103_0701_02_10:
The stuff they say can be hard to follow,
but it’s all new to me—and it’s interesting!
ch0286_40_svboy/7103_0701_03_10:
I wonder which professor I should listen
to today.
ch0286_40_svboy/7104_0701_01_10:
Ogerpon’s type changes depending on the
mask she wears. She’s a Pokémon that can
adapt to any situation.
ch0286_40_svboy/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s like what we do with outfits,
don’t you think?
ch0286_40_svboy/7105_0701_01_10:
When you go exploring with someone, study
with them, share fun experiences, and make
it through hard times together...
ch0286_40_svboy/7105_0701_02_10:
you remember your time with them forever,
right?
ch0286_40_svboy/7105_0701_03_10:
Do you have any memories like that,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0286_40_svboy/1701_0701_01_10: I’ve got something for you. Here, take it!
ch0286_40_svboy/1701_0702_01_10: It’s up to you how you use it!
ch0286_40_svboy/2501_0701_01_10: I love this outfit’s design and colors!
ch0286_40_svboy/2501_0701_02_10:
Juliana, Penny, and I have been taking
pictures all across Pasio.
ch0286_40_svboy/2501_0702_01_10:
Whenever we finish, Nemona’s there,
waiting to battle.
ch0286_40_svboy/2501_0702_02_10:
Even when we’re still taking pictures,
you can just tell she’s itching to battle.
Classic Nemona!
ch0286_40_svboy/2501_0702_03_10:
Which are YOU more interested in,
taking photos or Pokémon battling?
ch0286_40_svboy/2511_0701_01_10:
What’s great about winning a battle is
knowing all your prep was worth it—and
that your strategy worked!
ch0286_40_svboy/2511_0701_02_10: It’s like getting a good grade on a test.
ch0286_40_svboy/2511_0702_01_10:
When I lose a battle, I’m glad I can at least
see where I fell short.
ch0286_40_svboy/2511_0702_02_10:
Afterward, I can rethink my strategy and
how to use my Pokémon. And when I’m
confident enough, I’ll try again!
ch0286_40_svboy/2511_0702_03_10: You never want to end on a losing streak!
ch0286_40_svboy/3001_0701_01_10:
How’d you like a sandwich for breakfast?
I can fill it with things you like!
ch0286_40_svboy/3003_0701_01_10:
I always keep my Rotom Phone handy when
I’m out exploring! It lets me look up anything
right away.
ch0286_40_svboy/3005_0701_01_10:
I’d better review everything I learned today
before I go to sleep!
